title: England Champions vs Pakistan Champions Highlights, World Championship Of Legends: Pakistan Register Thrilling 5-Run Win Over England
description: Pakistan Champions vs England Champions Highlights, World Championship of Legends 2025: Pakistan Champions registered a thrilling 5-run win over England Champions.
excerpt: Pakistan Champions vs England Champions Highlights, World Championship of Legends 2025: Pakistan Champions registered a thrilling 5-run win over England Champions.
text: England Champions vs Pakistan Champions Highlights© X (formerly Twitter) Pakistan Champions vs England Champions Highlights, World Championship of Legends 2025: Pakistan Champions registered a thrilling 5-run win over England Champions in the tournament opener at Edgbaston, Birmingham on Friday. Pakistan Champions posted 160 for 9 in 20 overs after getting an invitation to bat first. Mohammad Hafeez scored 54 and Aamer Yamin slammed 27 not out off 13 while other Pakistan batters failed to impress. Liam Plunkett and Chris Tremlett were the pick of the bowlers for England with two wickets each. In the chase, Phil Mustard (58) and Ian Bell (51 not out) played noticeable knocks but failed to win the game for England. html:
England Champions vs Pakistan Champions Highlights© X (formerly Twitter)

Pakistan Champions vs England Champions Highlights, World Championship of Legends 2025: Pakistan Champions registered a thrilling 5-run win over England Champions in the tournament opener at Edgbaston, Birmingham on Friday. Pakistan Champions posted 160 for 9 in 20 overs after getting an invitation to bat first. Mohammad Hafeez scored 54 and Aamer Yamin slammed 27 not out off 13 while other Pakistan batters failed to impress. Liam Plunkett and Chris Tremlett were the pick of the bowlers for England with two wickets each. In the chase, Phil Mustard (58) and Ian Bell (51 not out) played noticeable knocks but failed to win the game for England. (Scorecard)
